description: Team Captain, nicknamed Ikamasa. Third year, muscle-bound, and obsessed with shaving his and other people`s body hair, and with wearing revealing Speedo bikini swim suits. He is in-fact the most annoying character of the swim team, driving most of the characters crazy from his antics. It is stated by Sanae that the only reason he is the captain is because she and Momoko needed three students to start the swim club, and just dragged him in. However, due to her tendency to make up stories this might not be true.
name: Ikariya Masa
